meanings.definition: The quality or state of being wide.
meanings.sent1: The wideness of the river made it difficult to swim across.
meanings.sent2: The wideness of the smile on her face showed how happy she was.
meanings.sent3: The wideness of the cake slice surprised the birthday girl.
meanings.sent4: The wideness of the field stretched out like a green carpet.
meanings.sent5: The wideness of the road allowed for smooth traffic flow.

meanings.definition: The extent or measurement of something from side to side.
meanings.sent1: The wideness of the table accommodated all the dishes for the feast.
meanings.sent2: The wideness of the bookshelf provided ample space for the books.
meanings.sent3: The wideness of the pizza slice made it a challenge to fit in the box.
meanings.sent4: The wideness of the canyon took their breath away as they peered over the edge.
meanings.sent5: The wideness of the screen allowed for a clear view from any angle.
